member.name: M:Countries.Api.Controllers.CountriesController.FilterByNameOrInitialsOrCurrency(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: (Questão 1C) Filter Countries by name and initials and currency. In case of no parameters returns the entire list.

member.name: M:Countries.Api.Controllers.CountriesController.CreateRoute(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: (Questão 2) Creates the best route between two given countries.
